name: Untitled cinematic experience
description:
I thought I would try something narrative based, a bit schlock-noir, and create the start of a  story. This was a project carefully planned out to spend a good part of nine days trying out cinematic shots and setups and learning a bit of lighting along the way.  Life decided to blow everything up and I maybe got 10 hours in total.  So, you get what you get. Everything is first pass and, well, a bit less intuitive than I'd like.  But at least I finished something.  I really wanted work dinosaurs in there somewhere, but alas.

There aren't enough caveats in the world....

Press A or a mouse click to advance dialogue

use the game pad stick or wasd to make the character do things

press escape to quit.

Be warned: it's pretty rough.
